'''Sacred Ibis''' is a type of bird that can be found in the [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Sacred Ibises can be found south-west of [[Dar al-Shifa]] and north-east of [[The Dune of Carouses]].
<gallery>
Wildlife Sacred Ibis Location 1.png
Wildlife Sacred Ibis Location 2.png
</gallery>

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=557 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* In Japanese, the bird is called the "{{w|black-headed ibis}}" {{Lang|ja=クロトキ|ja_rm=kuro toki}}.
